name: Brandish Mechanism Multi-Roll
desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 other card you control; send it to the GY, also your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to your Spell Card activations this turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can Set "Brandish" Spells with different names from your GY to your field, up to the number of "Brandish" Spell Cards you activated this turn while this card was face-up on the field, but banish them when they leave the field.
